question:
[Faye] and her son, [Christopher], went to the park to fly a kite. They had fun doing it all day. [Nola]'s father, [Daniel], felt a wave of sadness when [Nola] left for college. [Sarah] called her son [Roger] and his sister [Jamie] was at his house visiting so he said he would call her back later. [Faye] picked up her husband, [Gregory] from the pool. [Gregory] asked his brother [Daniel] if he would come help him fix his car next weekend. [Nola] and her father [Daniel] are having a very nice chicken dinner with [Daniel]'s wife [Jamie].
Question: How is [Christopher] related to [Sarah]?
